name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Golang Engineer with 8 years of comprehensive experience in developing high-performance, scalable applications. Proficient in **Golang**, **AWS**, microservices architecture, **NoSQL**, **SQL**, and Docker, I leverage a robust tech stack including **Python** and CI/CD tools such as **Jenkins** and **Git** to deliver secure and compliant solutions. My experience extends to infrastructure as code with **AWS CDK** and **Terraform**, as well as implementing messaging systems using **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **AWS SQS**.

I possess a strong background in building enterprise-grade platforms, leveraging cloud services, and enhancing system efficiencies through CI/CD automation. Additionally, I have a solid understanding of machine learning principles, with experience in deploying ML pipelines using **FastAPI** and other modern frameworks, as well as real-time data processing for solutions aligned with compliance standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS.
